com.rift.coad.daemon.email
Interface FetchMailServerMBean

All Superinterfaces:
java.rmi.Remote
public interface FetchMailServerMBean
extends java.rmi.Remote

This interface is responsible for providing a means to manage the fetch mail server. It provides both an RMI and JMX interface.

                          java.rmi.RemoteException
This method add a new pop account to the server.

Parameters:
emailAddress - The email address that identifies this account.
account - The account to add.
server - The server to retrieve the mail from.
password - The password to authenticate the account with.
targetAddress - The target address to forward the mail to.
Throws:
EmailException
